name: A banded jade turbo shell
data: It increases the users constitution nicely.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than avarage.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users cold resistance a bit.
It increases the users fire resistance a bit.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'ignore pain'.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
